transcript: mashallah you've been counseling now for so many years answering people's questions on huda on peace tv on so many different channels your answers are sometimes very deep and elaborated subhanallah connecting to the reality of life and i think that's one of the the um special things about you sheikh is that you're you know what's going on in the world and you're able to connect the and the opinions the scholars and the the the akita to the these current issues so i think you've been counseling and responding to people's questions all over the world for how many years now counselling as a commercial aspect for two and a half three years now alhamdulillah but counseling as a way of life as a teacher as an imam as alhamdulillah this is my 35th year with the grace of allah
